settings.title: MADAGASCAR VANILLA
settings.textarea: Enjoy the simplicity of vanilla on its own, or use it as the backdrop for your next scrumptious smoothie. Real ingredients equal real results. RISE311 contains Madagascar Vanilla bean (the world’s second most expensive spice) which is used by top chefs the world over for its elegant, delicate flavor profile. As a rich source of antioxidants, it helps stop free radicals in their tracks, while also aiding in cell regeneration and improving circulation.

settings.title: DARK CHOCOLATE
settings.textarea: Simply mix into water or your favorite milk (almond, oat, soy – you pick) for a creamy treat. Our cocoa is authentic and non-alkalized. Creating a flavor experience, not to mention a hefty serving of antioxidants. True cocoa comes with a heap of flavonoids that nutritionally support cardiovascular health. Mineral-rich, cocoa provides a magnesium boost to help support blood sugar balance and digestion.

settings.title: 1. ADD YOUR WATER
settings.text: Fill shaker or blender with 8oz of water

settings.title: 2. ADD RISE311
settings.text: Add 2 level RISE scoops (or 6 tablespoons)

settings.title: 3. SHAKE
settings.text: Shake gently or mix on low in a blender

settings.title: 4. BARISTA TIP
settings.text: For a smoothie, blend other ingredients first, then mix in RISE311 on low speed

settings.heading: Using RISE311 Is As Simple As This

settings.title: PEA PROTEIN
settings.content: Our split yellow peas are grown in pristine soil right here in the USA. They're then turned into a powder. Most pea proteins are finished here. But our pea protein goes through a patent-pending process that eliminates the usual texture and flavor associated with pea.  Get ready for something totally different!

settings.title: BARLEY PROTEIN
settings.content: Barley is renowned as an ancient grain, very beneficial to overall health, and contains all 9 essential amino acids. To create the concentrated barley protein in RISE311, the barley is sprouted and cold-temperature processed to create an ingredient that is 85% protein content. This ingredient retains many of the polyphenols and other antioxidant content of the barley grain.

settings.btn_text: READ MORE ABOUT OUR CRAFTED INGREDIENTS

settings.title: SMALL BATCHES. BIG IMPACT
settings.text: Carefully hand-picked ingredients... as good for the planet as they are for you.

settings.title: TRY RISK FREE
settings.text: We guarantee you'll taste and love RISE311 – or get your money back.

settings.title: MADE IN USA
settings.text: All RISE311 crafted protein is manufactured in the USA in an NSF GMP facility.

settings.title: PROVEN PERFORMANCE
settings.text: RISE311 is an integral part of Jason’s tools for his clients when time and results matter.

settings.heading: SHIPPING WITH CARE
settings.row_content: Orders before 2pm EST are shipped same day, and after 2pm EST are shipped next business day. Normally arriving at your doorstep in 4-6 business days.

settings.title: What makes RISE311 different from other protein powders?
settings.text: RISE311 is the world’s first craft protein. Combining excellent taste with full-spectrum protein, this is more than just protein; it's a uniquely satisfying experience.

settings.title: Do you include a scoop?
settings.text: To reduce waste, we do not include a plastic scoop in any of our pouches.   The premium stainless steel RISE311 scoop above is free with your first order (a value of $7.95).  If you need another, you can also buy one at any time from our store.

settings.title: What is the cost of Shipping?
settings.text: For a one-time shipment of 1 pouch of RISE311, standard shipping is $4.95. We offer free standard shipping for subscription orders.  We also offer expedited shipping for a small additional charge which will be calculated in your cart based off your delivery address. Additional costs apply for shipments to Hawaii, Alaska, and international orders.

settings.title: What if I don't like the flavor or texture?
settings.text: If you don’t love the flavor or texture, we’ve got you.  You can try one bag of each flavor, finish the bag, and still get a full refund (up to 30 days after the delivery date).  In fact, if you’re unhappy for any other reason (besides taste and flavor), you can still get a refund.  Check our refund policy in the footer below for more details.

settings.title: Can I cancel my subscription easily after ordering?
settings.text: Yes.  You have full access to your own customer portal where you can manage your subscription easily yourself without having to speak with anyone.  This portal allows you to change your delivery frequency, pause your subscription, cancel it, swap flavors etc.  If you’d prefer to speak with someone, simply send our team a message or give us a call, and can help with your subscription or any other queries you have.

settings.title: Why Don’t You Give Discounts?
settings.text:
You’ll see that unlike other shakes and powders, we don’t offer discount codes (they’re not available in our email series either). In fact, we don’t do sales. The reason? We think too many companies give discounts to new customers and forget about their current customers. That doesn’t feel fair to us. So we offer reductions for customers on subscriptions (in the pricing) and we have a referral program for customers.

In other words, we look after our community.

The only discount we are planning to introduce is a Veteran and Service discount (which should be going live shortly). If you’d like to know more, please email support and ask.

custom_css: .grid__item--one-quarter {max-width: 100%; width: calc(25% - var(--grid-horizontal-spacing) / 2); background: white; text-align: -webkit-center; max-height: 300px;}

settings.custom_liquid:
Built for performance

You’ve put in the work, now get the results.  Every serving delivers a full spectrum of amino acids.  30g of easily digested protein, 3g leucine, and a 1.0 complete protein score.    

PURE INGREDIENTS

Crafted with integrity, all of our ingredients are sustainably sourced and 100% plant-derived. 

Dark Chocolate

Our cocoa is authentic and non-alkalized. Creating an authentic flavor experience, not to mention a hefty serving of antioxidants.

True cocoa comes with a heap of flavonoids that nutritionally support cardiovascular health. Mineral-rich, cocoa provides a magnesium boost to help support blood sugar balance and digestion.

Ingredients: Fermented Pea Protein, Barley Rice Protein®, Natural Flavors, Natural Organic Cocoa Powder (non-alkalized), L-Leucine, ProHydrolase® (protease enzyme blend),Sunflower Lecithin, Reb-M Stevia, Acacia Gum (fiber), Utah Pink Mineral Sea Salt

Madagascar Vanilla

Real ingredients equal real results. RISE311 contains Madagascar Vanilla bean (the world’s second most expensive spice) which is used by top chefs the world over for its elegant, delicate flavor profile. As a rich source of antioxidants, it helps stop free radicals in their tracks, while also aiding in cell regeneration and improving circulation.

Ingredients: Fermented Pea Protein, Barley Rice Protein®, Natural Flavors, L-Leucine, ProHydrolase® (protease enzyme blend), Sunflower Lecithin, Reb-M Stevia, Acacia Gum (fiber), Madagascar Red Bourbon Vanilla Bean, Utah Pink Mineral Sea Salt

SHIPPING WITH CARE

Orders before 2pm EST are dispatched same day, and after 2pm EST are dispatched next business day. Arriving at your doorstep in 4-6 business days.

settings.text: To reduce waste, we do not include a plastic scoop in any of our pouches.   We offer a premium stainless steel RISE311 scoop free with our two pouch and four pouch packages on your first order.  Should you need another, you can also buy our premium stainless steel RISE311 scoop HERE.
